attributes.action: increase car tax on heavy polluting cars with top bands levying £1000+. At the same time make the cleanest available cars tax free (road and VAT).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only real way we are going to change behaviour on this issue is to price certain cars out of the market. Many of the gas guzzlers are expensive so the percentage of tax with respect to the list price must increase. This should only be for cars registered from March 2007.
